_meta.purpose: New heroic ability (Lucky) from the Drakborgen adventure module. Designed as a separate data package that can be enabled or disabled independently.
_meta.language_note: Swedish original terms preserved in 'name_sv' and 'description_sv' fields. This is a third-party adventure module with no official English translation; all English translations are unofficial and flagged with 'translation_official: false'.
_meta.compatibility: Adds one new heroic ability accessible via the Drakborgen adventure module.

heroic_abilities.name: Lucky
heroic_abilities.requirement: Spot Hidden FV 12, Awareness FV 12, or Movement 14
heroic_abilities.requirement_sv: Finna dolda ting FV 12, Upptäcka fara FV 12 eller Förflyttning 14

mechanical_effects.value: Roll WIL — on success, luck changes the narrative in your favor. GM determines the specific outcome.

mechanical_effects.note: Drakborgen-specific: automatically find a secret door on a failed Spot Hidden roll
Drakborgen-specific: immediately halve trap damage (round down)

mechanical_effects.value: Drakborgen-specific: used when the dragon awakens to see if it falls back asleep
